name: The Quest of the Dice
description:
My submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

D-Six the warrior, D-Four the archer and D-Twelve the monk are going for an adventure to find the sacred D20!

Each character has his own abilities, use them wisely to guide the party to the sacred cave.

Let me know what you think of the game!

Tileset by Adam Saltsman
